id.description: id is the peer id obtained from connect.

amount.description: The amount that the channel will be funded.

feerate.description: Sets the feerate for the subsequent commitment transaction.

announce.description: Whether or not to announce the channel.

close_to.description: A bitcoin address to which the channel funds should be sent to on close.

push_msat.description: The amount of millisatoshis to push to the channel at open. This is a gift to the peer.
